io.kyma.project.connector.pairing

Class PairingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.kyma.project.connector.pairing.PairingService

  • @Service
public class PairingService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service that "pairs" the client with Kyma / Extension Factory. It supports the following steps: * Initial Connect * Certificate Renewal * Get Info (Needs to be periodically invoked) All methods return a fresh Connection Model.
    Author:
    Andreas Krause
    See Also:
    ConnectionModel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PairingService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConnectionModel executeInitialPairing(java.net.URI connectUri, char[] keystorePassword)
      Establishes the initial connection to Kyma / Extension Factory and returns an object ConnectionModel with all needed details.
      ConnectionModel getInfo(ConnectionModel currentConnectionModel)
      Refreshes the current connection data to Kyma / Extension Factory and returns an object ConnectionModel with all needed details.
      ConnectionModel renewCertificate(ConnectionModel currentConnectionModel, char[] newKeyStorePassword)
      Refreshes the current certificate and private key used to communicate with Kyma / Extension Factory and returns a new object ConnectionModel with refreshed key store and password.
      void setCertService(CertificateService certService)
      Sets the CertificateService to be used by this object
      void setClientCertRestTemplateBuilder(ClientCertRestTemplateBuilder restTemplateBuilder)
      Sets the ClientCertRestTemplateBuilder to be used by this object
      void setPairingTemplate(org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate pairingTemplate)
      Sets the RestTemplate to be used by this object for the initila pairing step (no 2-way-ssl)

      • renewCertificate

        public ConnectionModel renewCertificate(ConnectionModel currentConnectionModel,
                                        char[] newKeyStorePassword)
        Refreshes the current certificate and private key used to communicate with Kyma / Extension Factory and returns a new object ConnectionModel with refreshed key store and password.
        Parameters:
        currentConnectionModel - model containing all details for the current connection
        newKeyStorePassword - password to be used for the refreshed keystore
        Returns:
        ConnectionModel that contains updated connection details with refreshed keystore
        Throws:
        ApplicationConnectorException - if anything fails
        RestTemplateCustomizerException - if anything fails with acquiring the RestTemplate

      • getInfo

        public ConnectionModel getInfo(ConnectionModel currentConnectionModel)
        Refreshes the current connection data to Kyma / Extension Factory and returns an object ConnectionModel with all needed details.
        Parameters:
        currentConnectionModel - model containing all details for the current connection
        Returns:
        ConnectionModel that contains updated connection details
        Throws:
        ApplicationConnectorException - if anything fails
        RestTemplateCustomizerException - if anything fails with acquiring the RestTemplate

      • executeInitialPairing

        public ConnectionModel executeInitialPairing(java.net.URI connectUri,
                                             char[] keystorePassword)
        Establishes the initial connection to Kyma / Extension Factory and returns an object ConnectionModel with all needed details.
        Parameters:
        keystorePassword - password to be provided for the keystore
        connectUri - with valid one time token from Connector Services
        Returns:
        ConnectionModel that contains all info related to the connection
        Throws:
        ApplicationConnectorException - if anything fails
